Reference

Grouping ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes by ...

IcdDxToCCS()

Get the Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories and description for ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on diagnoses.

IcdDxToCCSLvl()

Get the Multi-level Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories and description for ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on diagnoses.

IcdDxToPhecode()

Get the Phecode or description of ICD-9 diagnosis codes

IcdDxToComorbid()

Grouping comorbid method comorbidities (AHRQ, Charlson and Elixhauser Comorbidity) infers whether to use ICD-9 or ICD-10 codes

IcdDxToCustom()

Get the categories of ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on diagnoses, the grouping rules are based on your standards.

IcdDxToCustomGrep()

Get the categories of ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on diagnoses, the grouping rules are based on your standards.

IcdPrToCCS()

Get the Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories and description for ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on procedures.

IcdPrToCCSLvl()

Get the Multi-level Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) categories and description for ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on procedures.

IcdPrToProcedureClass()

Get the Procedure Class for ICD-9 and ICD-10 codes on procedures.

selectCases()

Select cases based on ICD code and the number of ICD codes

getConditionEra()

Get the condition era

Conversion ICD format

IcdDxShortToDecimal()

Convert ICD Codes From Short To Decimal Forms

IcdDxDecimaltoShort()

Convert ICD Codes From Decimal To Short Forms

IcdPrShortToDecimal()

Convert ICD-9-PCS Codes From Short To Decimal Forms

IcdPrDecimaltoShort()

Convert ICD-9-PCS Codes From Decimal To Short Forms

Generation Decimal Format of ICD-9-CM and ICD-10-CM code

ICD9DxGenerateDecimalFormat()

get ICD-9-CM Codes Decimal Forms

ICD10DxGenerateDecimalFormat()

get ICD-10-CM Codes Decimal Forms

ICD9PrGenerateDecimalFormat()

get ICD-9-PCS Codes Decimal Forms

Data - Two format of ICD-9-CM and ICD-10-CM code maps

ICD9DxwithTwoFormat

Two format of ICD-9-CM (2011): Short and Decimal

ICD10DxwithTwoFormat

Two format of ICD-10-CM (2019): Short and Decimal

ICD9PrwithTwoFormat

Two format of ICD-9-PCS: Short and Decimal

Data - Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) to ICD-9-CM and ICD-10-CM code maps

ccsDxICD9

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) for ICD-9-CM

ccsDxICD10

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) for ICD-10-CM

Data - Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) to ICD-9-PCS and ICD-10-PCS code maps

ccsPrICD9

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) for ICD-9-PCS

ccsPrICD10

Clinical Classifications Software (CCS) for ICD-10-PCS

Data - ICD-9 and ICD-10 CM/PCS/Procedure Class code maps

dxICD10

ICD-9-CM

dxICD10

ICD-10-CM

prICD9

ICD-9-PCS

prICD10

ICD-10-PCS

pcICD9

Procedure Class for ICD-9-PCS

pcICD10

Procedure Class for ICD-10-PCS

Data - Comorbidity to ICD-9-CM and ICD-10-CM code maps

icd9_ahrq

AHRQ Comorbidity for ICD-9

icd10_ahrq

AHRQ Comorbidity for ICD-10

icd9_charlson

Charlson Comorbidity for ICD-9

icd10_charlson

Charlson Comorbidity for ICD-10

icd9_elix

Elixhauser Comorbidity for ICD-9

icd10_elix

Elixhauser Comorbidity for ICD-10

Data - Phecode to ICD-9-CM code maps

phecode_icd9_2

Phecode for ICD-9
